Text: RE error repairspst The pricing for the base deal is based on the GD but its the average of the gas daily plus right And I was told that Sitara could not handle this pricing structure that it had to be calculated and entered as a fixed price Is this correct Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Friday August PM To Vela Valerie Subject RE error repairs Valerie The pricing on the base deal should also be based on GD I have changed the price to GDP Let me know if that doesnt correct that piece Jay is currently looking into the volume issue D Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Friday August PM To Smith Joseph Cc Farmer Daren J Subject RE error repairs Jay For June I need a couple of things changed in Sitara Deal the commodity price needs to be Deal the commodity price needs to be WAHAHUBGDPDA And for July It looks like were missing some volume Deal baseload deal should have per day allocated AND in Sitara this deal should be priced at Deal swing deal currently has in the scheduled column and it should be based on the spreadsheet I sent Did you have some conflicting volumes Im resending what the volumes should be AND the pricing for this should be at WAHAHUBGDPDA File daily swingxls I think that should do if for now Ill wait to see how these changes come across Please notify me when these changes have been made Thanks Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Tuesday August PM To Smith Joseph Subject RE error repairs Thanks Original Message From Smith Joseph Sent Tuesday August PM To Vela Valerie Subject RE error repairs The errors have also been repaired for the month of July Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Tuesday August PM To Smith Joseph Subject RE error repairs Thank youIll look for this change to come across Original Message From Smith Joseph Sent Tuesday August PM To Vela Valerie Subject error repairs Valerie In reference to a note sent to Darren Farmer Houston Pipleline mistake on June th The volume of for deal was a mistake The proper value was just as you had mentioned Everything should now be fixed Please let me know if you need anything else Thanks Jay Smith

RE error repairs Cc Jay For June I need a couple of things changed in Sitara Deal the commodity price needs to be Deal the commodity price needs to be WAHAHUBGDPDA And for July It looks like were missing some volume Deal baseload deal should have per day allocated AND in Sitara this deal should be priced at Deal swing deal currently has in the scheduled column and it should be based on the spreadsheet I sent Did you have some conflicting volumes Im resending what the volumes should be AND the pricing for this should be at WAHAHUBGDPDA I think that should do if for now Ill wait to see how these changes come across Please notify me when these changes have been made Thanks Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Tuesday August PM To Smith Joseph Subject RE error repairs Thanks Original Message From Smith Joseph Sent Tuesday August PM To Vela Valerie Subject RE error repairs The errors have also been repaired for the month of July Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Tuesday August PM To Smith Joseph Subject RE error repairs Thank youIll look for this change to come across Original Message From Smith Joseph Sent Tuesday August PM To Vela Valerie Subject error repairs Valerie In reference to a note sent to Darren Farmer Houston Pipleline mistake on June th The volume of for deal was a mistake The proper value was just as you had mentioned Everything should now be fixed Please let me know if you need anything else Thanks Jay Smith

Guadalupe Power Junepst Hi Daren I saw the volumes come across for deal Thanks for taking care of that so promptly On day did you intentionally enter days or was it a slip of the fingers Did your information conflict with Jillsshe shows for that day Valerie Vela Enron Net Works LLC Gas Settlements t f

June July swing volumes for Guadalupe Power Partnerspst Hi Daren I appreciate your prompt attention to this matter Here are the swing volumes as you requested Dont pay attention to anything other than the highlighted columns in Julys spreadsheet bc its not finished If you need anything else please let me know Thanks Valerie Vela Enron Net Works LLC Gas Settlements t f

RE Deal I have to manually redraft for this to pull through and unfortunately I do need the deal number Hope its not too much trouble Thanks Original Message From Giron Darron C Sent Wednesday October AM To Vela Valerie Subject RE Deal Bryant split the deal so that Aug is under GeorgiaPacific and Sep is under Domtar So you should see it if you draft for Domtar for Sep If not please let me know Unfortunately I dont think Bryant wrote the deal number down But we can find it if necessary DG Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Wednesday October AM To Giron Darron C Subject Deal Hi Darron I noticed that you changed the term date on this deal However I didnt see it come through on the Domtar Industries side Is this supposed to be charged to them again for September Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

Deal Hi Darron I noticed that you changed the term date on this deal However I didnt see it come through on the Domtar Industries side Is this supposed to be charged to them again for September Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

RE Flight Details and MiscYes I have a reservation at the Westin What time do you want to head out on Tuesday Call my room in the morning when you get up and moving around My cell phone just in case is Jason Williams in credit Jeff Hodge and I had a conference call late Friday You already know everything we talked about Im sure Jeff advised that we should have a number in mind that they may be asking for Hopefully Jason called you See you in the morning Valerie Original Message From Mims Patrice L Sent Monday October AM To Vela Valerie Subject RE Flight Details and Misc Did you get with Alex to find out what hotel It is the Westin Also who is Jason and what are HS numbers As far as delivery point yes it is the interconnect between Midwestern and Vectren the LDC Please make sure and bring your pipeline statements Also I did meet with Jeff Hodge our attorney and I know the details regarding the contract Ill be in the office until around Thanks Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Friday October PM To Mims Patrice L Subject Flight Details and Misc Hi Patrice Im going to get an earlier flight in on Monday Ill leave Houston at and arrive Indianapolis at Ill just take a cab to the hotel that night This is much better so we dont have to worry about being late On a side noteJason will be calling you regarding some HS numbers Did you find anything out about the contract and what it says about the delivery point Are we going to discuss that there Also Im going to try to talk with Lisa Mellancamp and find out exactly which topics are off limits I know youre leaving Monday but well have time to talk about all this on the drive to Terra Haute Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

Flight Details and MiscHi Patrice Im going to get an earlier flight in on Monday Ill leave Houston at and arrive Indianapolis at Ill just take a cab to the hotel that night This is much better so we dont have to worry about being late On a side noteJason will be calling you regarding some HS numbers Did you find anything out about the contract and what it says about the delivery point Are we going to discuss that there Also Im going to try to talk with Lisa Mellancamp and find out exactly which topics are off limits I know youre leaving Monday but well have time to talk about all this on the drive to Terra Haute Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

RE Edison Mission Marketing TradeYes I will get that set up to pay tomorrowthanks Original Message From Mims Patrice L Sent Tuesday November AM To Vela Valerie Subject RE Edison Mission Marketing Trade did you get the word from max that everything is cool to release the Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Wednesday November AM To Mims Patrice L Subject Edison Mission Marketing Trade Hi Patrice I have an issue with Edison Mission and I saw your name on a deal from October so I thought I could ask you about it It looks like the deals are on a month to month basis They paid us M back in February and each month we deduct their invoice from this balance They called Max in Credit x and want their money back So I am fully prepared to wire them their money back I just want to make sure all the people involved are aware Credit is going to request an invoice from them stating what we owe them When that comes in someone in credit will sign off on this request I just want to make the frontend aware of whats going on Do you know who else does these deals Thanks for your help Have a GREAT Thanksgivingyou may already be goneif so lucky you Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f
Heartland Steel revisedValerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f
Heartland SteelHi Patrice Just wanted to give you something to look at when Im talking to youcall me when you get this Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

Heartland Steel InvoiceHi Patrice I left you a voice mail earlier but I wanted to send a spreadsheet so you can see what Im looking at Have the buyback prices been changed in Sitara Which months are you going to change Is CSN going to be a prepay If so then I will add the Nov prepay to the invoice Please take a look at the invoice and let me know if you think this is what theyre looking for By the way I never got a chance to really thank you for bringing me along on the trip I truly appreciate the learning experience and the chance to see firsthand how you interact with our clients And it wouldnt have been quite as enjoyable with just anybodyyou were great company Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

RE Heartland Steel revisedSounds good just let me know what time and Ill bring my folder up Original Message From Mims Patrice L Sent Tuesday November PM To Vela Valerie Subject RE Heartland Steel revised How about coming up after lunch tomorrow to wrap up CSN Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Wednesday October PM To Mims Patrice L Subject Heartland Steel revised File Heartland Steel Reconxls Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f
Heartland SteelHi Patrice Just let me know when youd like me to come down Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

Heartland SteelHi Patrice I know its never going to be a good time to take care of this deal but weve got to do it sometime Let me know what time is good for you Please let me know the payment terms of the new deal so that I can get with the new coordinator of this account More specifically are they still prepaying Since the name changed to c I will no longer be handling it Bummer huh Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

RE Heartland SteelI understandsorry about your son Ill be up around then Original Message From Mims Patrice L Sent Thursday November AM To Vela Valerie Subject RE Heartland Steel Sorry I was not in the mood on ThursdayFriday and then my son broke his arm over the weekend and I was out until today For sure today around just come on up Thanks Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Tuesday November AM To Mims Patrice L Subject Heartland Steel Hi Patrice I know its never going to be a good time to take care of this deal but weve got to do it sometime Let me know what time is good for you Please let me know the payment terms of the new deal so that I can get with the new coordinator of this account More specifically are they still prepaying Since the name changed to c I will no longer be handling it Bummer huh Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

Edison Mission Marketing TradeHi Patrice I have an issue with Edison Mission and I saw your name on a deal from October so I thought I could ask you about it It looks like the deals are on a month to month basis They paid us M back in February and each month we deduct their invoice from this balance They called Max in Credit x and want their money back So I am fully prepared to wire them their money back I just want to make sure all the people involved are aware Credit is going to request an invoice from them stating what we owe them When that comes in someone in credit will sign off on this request I just want to make the frontend aware of whats going on Do you know who else does these deals Thanks for your help Have a GREAT Thanksgivingyou may already be goneif so lucky you Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

Heartland SteelPatriceIm working on the reconciliation and Ive noticed that in Sitara for deal the pricing is at Citygate GD for day Did you go back in and change this Let me know bc the pricing is coming across in Unify as rather than the you put in for the rest of the month Ill send you the spreadsheet as soon as its done Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

Heartland Steel ReconciliationHi Patrice Heres what I have so far The new company is not fully set up so Im not able to see the volumesdollars come across in Unify yet This should be done by tomorrow and then Ill send you that information as well Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

RE Greeley Gas Revised JulyDid you add this onto the August invoice If so can you send me an updated version of that as well Thanks Ill let you know how it comes across Valerie Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Friday September PM To Vela Valerie Subject Greeley Gas Revised July Valerie I have adjusted the July invoice to account for the MMBtu that we delivered to Greeley on July off of PSCO I also corrected a mistake on the rd party utilization fee Please redraft and let me know if everything looks ok Thanks Theresa I will be emailing this revised July along with August to Greeley File Greeley Gas July final Revised xls

RE Greeley Gas September Yeah Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday October PM To Vela Valerie Subject RE Greeley Gas September Im glad Im very sorry about that mix up Thank goodness we only have one more month of this deal and it expires We did not renew it Talk to you later Theresa Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Wednesday October PM To Staab Theresa Subject RE Greeley Gas September Theresa Dont worry about itlooks good now Thanks Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday October PM To Vela Valerie Subject Greeley Gas September Okay Guys Call me CRAZY I dont know what I did but I had the wrong Gas Daily pricing in the spreadsheet for September Please accept my apology One would have thought Id have this down pat by now Sorry about this I hope this is the last revision for September Call me if you have any questions Thanks Theresa File Greeley Gas September xls

RE Greeley Gas September Theresa Dont worry about itlooks good now Thanks Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Wednesday October PM To Vela Valerie Subject Greeley Gas September Okay Guys Call me CRAZY I dont know what I did but I had the wrong Gas Daily pricing in the spreadsheet for September Please accept my apology One would have thought Id have this down pat by now Sorry about this I hope this is the last revision for September Call me if you have any questions Thanks Theresa File Greeley Gas September xls

RE Revised September Theresa Ive redrafted and were still offeven more now Since were ok on volumes now its got to be pricing somewhere Please look over and let me know thanks Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Monday October PM To Vela Valerie Subject Revised September The only revision is the th on the Gas Daily volume It is not Thanks Theresa File Greeley Gas September xls

Greeley Hi Theresa Please take a look at the pricing in Sitara versus your spreadsheet Im faxing you copies of the invoices that are in the system Ive recently redrafted this morning The volumes tie so the pricing must be off somewhere Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

RE Greeley Gas actualsTheresa Did you get my message from yesterday They still havent changed the volume on deal It doesnt match your spreadsheet Let me know what you want to do Thanks Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Monday October PM To Vela Valerie Subject Greeley Gas actuals Valerie I just wanted to let you know Logistics is working on actualizing a few days in September to correct the volumes allocated to each specific Greeley deal Jackie Adams is trying to get this done today The numbers in my spreadsheet by deal bucket are correct and we are waiting for the corrections in the system Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Theresa

RE Greeley Gas actualsDo you know if this has been done yet I want to compare the two Original Message From Staab Theresa Sent Monday October PM To Vela Valerie Subject Greeley Gas actuals Valerie I just wanted to let you know Logistics is working on actualizing a few days in September to correct the volumes allocated to each specific Greeley deal Jackie Adams is trying to get this done today The numbers in my spreadsheet by deal bucket are correct and we are waiting for the corrections in the system Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Theresa

Greeley Gas Oct Hi Theresa I just got through redrafting for October to pull in the new storage volumes and prices It looks like there are three new demand charges I dont really understand since the last email you sent said you had to reduce the demand charge If these demand charges are valid then we would need to send out a revised manual invoice Let me know either way Thanks Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f

Greeley Gas invoiceHi Theresa Were under A TON of pressure this month to get our money in the door on time and as close to invoice amount as possible I want to make sure these people have absolutely no reason to pay us late As soon as you have the spreadsheet done please email it to me so I can tie it to the system Thanks for your help Valerie Vela Specialist Gas Settlements Enron Net Works LLC t f
